entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
